item.title: Is the new e-Privacy Regulation a threat to human rights? Exploring the implications of Tele2 and Watson.
item.description: Matthew White, Ph.D candidate, Sheffield Hallam University Introduction This post follows up on a previous one from last Christmas, which discussed data retention in the context of the proposed Regulation on Privacy and Electronic Communications (e-Privacy Regs). The European Commission released the official version of the e-Privacy Regs on January 10, 2017. Like the leaked version, the official proposal does not have specific provisions for data retention (para 1.3). The proposal allows Member States to maintain or create their own data retention laws.
